item.description:
CROWNE PLAZA ATLANTA AIRPORT $89 PER NIIGHT

866-750-3365

10-Minute Shuttle to/from Airport

Rooms reserved under The Steppers Club
TSC's Rate good through August 27th
1 Night Room Guarantee, Nonrefundable

 

 Weekend Agenda  Welcome To Atlanta 2k11   Host Hotel: Crowne Plaza (Atlanta Airport)
Within Walkin Distance To Local Restaurants
Hospitality Suite in Crawford Room (across from Lobby Bar)
Hospitality Hours: 1p-9p Thursday, Friday, Saturday Sunday @ Workshop Registration Desk

Thursday, September 1  Welcome Home 2 Atlanta

  Workshops
12:00-2:00p Steppin N2 Ballroom Workshop w/Purple Charlotte Steppers
2:15p-3:15p Steppers Workout: Line Dancin w/Casper

Sunday @ Workshop Registration Desk

  9 p - 2 a The African Ball " Featuring A Taste of Africa"   

Las Nubes Ballroom

5885 Old Dixie Highway, Forest Park 30297

4th Annual Dancin For $$ Contest 

African Art for Best Dressed Couple
Win an 8-day Trip to African (restrictions apply)  

ATTIRE: Dressy African Attire    

 

  NEW:Friday, September 2 (After The Ball)
After The Ball w/ATL Steppers & Walkers
MetroPlex, 1959 Metropolitan Parkway, SW, Atlanta
2a-6a  Admission:  Afterparty for Fri $15 

 Afterparty for Fri & Sat $20

 

Saturday, September 3  Workshops:
12:30-02:00p Advancin The Dance Walkin Workshop
2:15p-03:45p Instructors' Workshop (Teaching You To Teach)
4:00p-05:30p Advancin The Dance Men "Leaders" Only (All Levels  

 

Saturday, September 3:  The Royal Ball Hosted by Anthony David
9p-2a  Steppin N Royal Attire 

Las Nubes Ballroom  5885 Old Dixie Highway, Forest Park 

Attire: Formal -  Absolutely No Jeans or Shorts Please
4th Annual Drawing: 26’ Flat Screen, $100, Portable DVD Player
Grand Prize: 8-day Trip to Africa (restrictions apply) 

﻿

Saturday (After The Ball)  2a-6a
NEW:After The Ball w/ATL Steppers & Walkers
MetroPlex, 1959 Metropolitan Parkway, SW, Atlanta
Admission: Afterparty for Sat $15 

Afterparty for Fri & Sat $20

 

Sunday, September 4  Workshops
10:30-11:30a Steppers Workout: Featuring Zumba w/Yvette O'Donnell
11:40-12:40p Steppers Workout: Featuring Kick Boxing w/Lisa Barnes
12:45-02:15p The Diva Workshop (Ladies "Followers" Only All Levels)
2:30p-04:15p Advance Workshop (The Next Dance Level)
4:30p-05:45p The Steppin Game – A Discussion w/T. Pratt w/Chistepper.com   

Sunday, September 4  The 70s Ball Featuring Malachi (Blowin My Mind)
9p-2a  The 70s Ball  Win $$$ For Best Outfit  $1,000 HeavyHitter's Contest
MetroPlex, 1959 Metropolitan Parkway, SW, Atlanta 

 

Monday, September 5  The Green Ball Featuring GREEN Day (Recycle Day)
Featuring Our 1st Annual Walkers Contest for Beginners
1p-until 

NEW: Steppin N Jeans & GREEN T-shirt
Crowne Plaza HOST HOTEL 1325 Virginia Avenue  Atlanta, GA 30344
Recycle. Reuse. Reduce. Support Planet Earth by Recycling

﻿Instructors:

﻿STEPPIN B, DRE BLACKWELL, 'BABY BOY' DREW, MS.MEME, SHORTY SMOOTH & DEON, JAWANA &  DESMOND CARTER, RENEE,SHERRY GORON, SARAH TEAGLE, TIMRIFIC & YVETTE

﻿ STEPPIN GAME MODERATOR - TERRANCE PRATT (chistepper.com)

﻿ steppersball.com  877.41.step  steppersballcommittee@hotmail.com  mysteppersclub.com

 

  It's Easy! Just call 1-866-683-8368 &
ask for the steppersball.com special
Monday - Friday 8a-9p | Eastern Time

All Attendees must book all EventSavers reservations directly with the EventSavers Desk to receive the 10% discount.  Reservations booked through a travel agent General Data System or the internet will not qualify for the 10% discount .

 Receive special EventSavers rates from our rental car partner Hertz , just for being transferred to the Hertz Desk by our EventSavers Coordinator!

 

To take advantage of this special program, contact the AirTran Airways EventSavers Desk at 1-866-68EVENT (1-866-683-8368) for reservations. All patrons will need to have the listed Event Code and must provide the name of the Event

 

Up on booking. Please provide the EventSavers Coordinator with Event Code :

  ﻿ STEPPERSBALL.COM

﻿

﻿
